summary: WHILE BACKING OUT OF A PARKING SPOT THE STEERING WHEEL JERKED ITSELF OUT OF MY HAND, ALMOST BREAKING MY HAND AND LOCKED UP AND COULDN'T BE TURNED AT ALL. WHILE LOCKED UP IT FINALLY BROKE FREE FOR A BIT AND JERKED ITSELF OUT OF MY HANDS AGAIN.  PUT IT INTO DRIVE TO PULL FORWARD SO I DIDN'T GET HIT BY OTHER VEHICLSE IN PARKING LOT TOO.   IT DID THE SAME THING GOING FORWARD, JERKED ITSELF FROM MY HANDS, THE RADIO EVEN CHANGED STATIONS ON ITS OWN. DURING THIS THE DIC SHOWED A STABILITRAK NEEDS SERVICE MESSAGE AND WORKED OK ONCE I FINALLY GOT IT TO BACK OUT AND GO FORWARD AND AS LONG AS THE VEHICLE WASN'T SHUT OFF IT RAN OK, ABUT ONCE SHUTOFF, THE SAME ISSUES RETURNED EVERY TIME, EVEN AT THE CHEVROLET DEALER WHERE IT SITS NOW IN MISSION, TX   THESE EVENTS OCCURRED WHILE STATIONARY AND ALSO WHILE VEHICLE WAS IN MOTION WHICH IS DOWNRIGHT DANGEROUS.  WHILE THIS IS NOT MY VIDEO OR MY TRUCK, THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT I AM EXPLAINING ABOVE:  [XXX]    PARTS OF THIS DOCUMENT HAVE BEEN REDACTED TO PROTECT PERSONALLY IDENTIFIABLE INFORMATION PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).
